text: Babbar Subhash is an Indian film director, producer and screenwriter who primarily works in Hindi films. He is known for his film collaborations with actor Mithun Chakraborty including Disco Dancer (1982), Kasam Paida Karne Wale Ki (1984), and Dance Dance (1987). ==Filmography== *Apna Khoon (as B. Subhash) *Zalim (as B. Subhash) *Disco Dancer (as B. Subhash) *Taqdeer Ka Badshah *Kasam Paida Karne Wale Ki (as B. Subhash) *Aandhi-Toofan *Adventures of Tarzan *Dance Dance (as B. Subhash) *London Calling (as B. Subhaas) *Commando (as B. Subhash) *Classic Dance of Love *Dulhan Banoo Main Teri *Divine Lovers (as B. Subhash) *Nachnewala Gaanewale *Pyar Ke Naam Qurbaan (as B. Subhash) *Love Love Love (as B. Subhash) *Aaj Ke Angaarey ==References== ==External links== * Category:Hindi-language film directors Category:20th-century Indian film directors
title: Babbar Subhash
